cta.subtitle: Gather all your links in one link now
cta.title: Ready to create your personal link?

footer.tagline: One link for all your links

feature-highlight-1.title: Design Your Page Your Way
feature-highlight-1.subtitle: Take full control of your page design in the way you like with the shapes and colors you love! Or you can use ready-made templates

feature-highlight-2.title: All Your Favorite Platforms
feature-highlight-2.subtitle: From social media platforms to delivery apps and even communication methods like WhatsApp or direct calls!

hero.title: Pukla Features
hero.subtitle: Discover a world of possibilities - from seamless link management to interactive content - all in one versatile platform.

feature-1.title: Customizable Design
feature-1.description: Create a unique bio link page that reflects your style. Customize with themes, colors, and page layouts to match your brand or personal taste.

feature-2.title: Social Media Integration
feature-2.description: Connect your Pukla page with all social media platforms. One link to unify your online presence and boost your reach.

feature-3.title: Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
feature-3.description: Boost your page visibility with SEO-friendly features. Improve your search rankings and attract more organic visits.

feature-4.title: Security and Privacy
feature-4.description: Your data security and privacy are our top priorities. Pukla uses advanced encryption and security protocols to keep your information safe.

feature-5.title: Support and Resources
feature-5.description: Have questions or need help? Our support team and resource library are available to assist you every step of the way.

feature-6.title: Mobile Responsiveness
feature-6.description: Your Pukla page looks great on any device. Enjoy a responsive design that ensures a seamless experience for your audience, regardless of how they access your page.

feature-7.title: Real-time Analytics
feature-7.description: Track your success with real-time analytics. Better understand your audience through insights on page views, link clicks, and engagement metrics.

feature-8.title: QR Code Generation
feature-8.description: Generate QR codes for your Pukla page, making it easy for offline audiences to access your online content.

feature-9.title: E-commerce Integration
feature-9.description: Sell your products or services directly through your Pukla page with seamless e-commerce platform integration.

Pricing.not-sure: Not sure which plan to choose? <contactSales>Contact us</contactSales>

hero.title: Ready to Subscribe?
hero.subtitle: Choose the right plan to take advantage of the features offered in each package

header.title: Frequently Asked Questions
header.subtitle: You have all the questions, we have the answers

faq-1.question: What is Pukla?
faq-1.answer: Pukla is a link management tool that helps you connect your audience with all your online content through one simple link.

faq-2.question: How can I set up my Pukla page?
faq-2.answer: Sign up, add the links you want, customize your page to match your style, and you're ready to go!

faq-3.question: Is Pukla free to use?
faq-3.answer: Yes, Pukla offers a free plan for everyone and also a basic plan with additional features for advanced users.

faq-4.question: Can I customize the design of my Pukla page?
faq-4.answer: Yes! Pukla offers a variety of customization options to ensure your page reflects your personal style or brand.

faq-5.question: Can I upgrade or cancel my plan at any time?
faq-5.answer: Yes, you can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your plan at any time to suit your needs.

faq-contact.question: How can I contact support?
faq-contact.answer: You can contact us via <email>email</email>, <twitter>Twitter</twitter>, <whatsapp>WhatsApp</whatsapp>, or <phone>phone</phone>

ReportPage.page-subtitle: Have you discovered an illegal or unethical issue in one of the Puklas? Please fill out the following form to report it.

additional-comments.label: Additional comments to help us identify the report

copyright-owner.label: Copyright Owner Name
copyright-owner.hint: If you are filling out this form as the copyright owner, your name will be in this field

relationship-copyright-owner.label: My relationship to the copyright owner
relationship-copyright-owner.hint: For example: I am the copyright owner / I am an employee of the copyright owner / I am legal counsel / I am an authorized agent
relationship-copyright-owner.required: Your relationship to the copyright owner is required

reporter-role-options.non_pukla_user: Visitor and not a Pukla platform user

submitted.title: Your report has been submitted successfully
submitted.subtitle: Thank you for helping us maintain a safe environment for all Pukla users. We will review your report and take necessary action if required

report-ip.title: Report Intellectual Property Violations
report-ip.subtitle: Is there a Pukla that violates your intellectual property or trademark? Please fill out the following form

good-faith.label: I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted content I am reporting is not authorized by the copyright owner, their agent, or the law.

trademark-good-faith.label: I have a good faith belief that use of the trademark content I am reporting is not authorized by the trademark owner, their agent, or the law.

trademark-authorized.label: I swear under penalty of perjury that I am the trademark owner, or authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

trademark-no-lie.label: I acknowledge that knowingly submitting a false trademark infringement claim may result in liability under the Digital Millennium Copyright Act.

authorized.label: I swear under penalty of perjury that I am the copyright owner, or authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

correct-info.label: I certify that all information provided in this notice is accurate.

my-info-shared.label: I understand that my personal details, contact information, and the content of this report will be shared with the user I am reporting.

no-lie.label: I acknowledge that knowingly submitting a false copyright infringement claim may result in liability under the Digital Millennium Copyright Act.

trademark-owner.label: Trademark Owner Name
trademark-owner.hint: If you are filling out this form as the trademark owner, your name will be in this field

relationship-trademark-owner.label: My relationship to the trademark owner
relationship-trademark-owner.hint: For example: I am the trademark owner / I am an employee of the trademark owner / I am legal counsel / I am an authorized agent
relationship-trademark-owner.required: Your relationship to the trademark owner is required

trademark-industry.label: Trademark Industry
trademark-industry.required: Trademark industry is required (e.g.: Media, E-commerce, etc)
